data.text: “Ɛnnɛ mpo, mʼabooboodie mu da so yɛ den;
Sɛ menim baabi a mɛhunu no;
Anka mɛte mmuaeɛ a ɔde bɛma me,
Ɔde tumi a ɛso bɛtia me anaa?
Ɛhɔ deɛ nnipa tenenee bɛtumi aka nʼasɛm wɔ nʼanim,
“Nanso sɛ mekɔ apueeɛ fam a, ɔnni hɔ;
Sɛ ɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ atifi fam a, menhunu no;
Nanso, ɔnim ɛkwan a me nam soɔ;
Mentwee me ho mfirii mmaransɛm a ɛfiri nʼanom ho,
“Nanso ɔbiara nni hɔ ka ne ho, na hwan na ɔbɛtumi atia no?
Ɔhwɛ ma ne ɔhyɛ nsɛm tia me;
Ɛno enti na mebɔ hu wɔ nʼanim;
Nanso esum no mma menka mʼano ntom,
